name: 劉宛育
objective:
本課程介紹當代重要的建築思潮、事件與作品。從代謝派到流體建築的發展，每週選定一個主題說明之。

開學週進行課程說明（含課程內容與評量標準）與選課名單確認
有意修習本課程的同學請準時出席

修課期間請加入並開啟本社團通知
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ntutarch155/
schedule:
Week 01　Introduction
Week 02　Futurism & Expressionism
Week 03　Constructivism & Deconstructivism
Week 04　Structuralism & Metabolism
Week 05　國慶日
Week 06　Radical architecture
Week 07　Soft architecture
Week 08　期中評圖 
Week 09　期中考週
Week 10　Clip-on architecture
Week 11　Postmodern architecture
Week 12　Blob architecture
Week 13　Contemporary architecture in Latin America
Week 14　Reflection 
Week 15　期末簡報 part1
Week 16　期末簡報 part2
Week 17　期末評圖 
Week 18　期末考週
materials:
Conrads, Ulrich (1975) Programs and Manifestoes on 20th-Century Architecture. The MIT Press.

Ockman, Joan (1993) Architecture Culture: 1943-1968. Rizzoli International Publications.

Jencks & Kropf (2006) Theories and Manifestoes of Contemporary Architecture (2nd ed.). Academy Press.

Hays, K. Michael (2000) Architecture Theory Since 1968. The MIT Press.

Nesbitt, Kate (1996) Theorizing a New Agenda for Architecture: An Anthology of Architectural Theory 1965-1995 (2nd ed.). Princeton Architectural Press.

Sykes & Hays (2010) Constructing a New Agenda: Architecture Theory 1993-2009. Princeton Architectural Press.

Braham & Hale (2006) Rethinking Technology: A Reader in Architectural Theory. Routledge.

Scott, Felicity D. (2010) Architecture or Techno-utopia: Politics After Modernism. The MIT Press.

Cros, Susanna (2003) The Metapolis Dictionary of Advanced Architecture: City, Technology and Society in the Information Age. ACTAR.

Moneo, Rafael (2004) Theoretical Anxiety and Design Strategies In the Work of Eight Contemporary Architects. ACTAR. 《哈佛大學建築系的八堂課》

Jencks, Charles (2011) The Story of Post-modernism: Five Decades of the Ironic, Iconic and Critical in Architecture. John Wiley & Sons.

Tschumi, Bernard (2012) Architecture Concepts: Red is Not a Color. Rizzoli.
